item.title: Teleport cases
item.dc:creator: @tawr tawr
item.description:
@tawr wrote:

Hey. i’m working on castle wars stairs and there really gving me greif.

becuase each castle uses 3 of the same stairs it makes it harder to use

Case: 4417 if((objectX == XXXX && objectY == XXXX);heighLevel = 1 || etc.

so i thought i should try

if(objectX == 1234 && objectY == 1234)heightLevel = 1; } (teleport coords here) } }else if (objectX == 1234 && objectY == 1234)heightLevel = 1; } (other teleport codes) } break;

thats pretty much how i did it, but i got 100 errors, could someone please tell me the mistake i’ve made
thanks
tawr
